intro: Persoonia scabra, commonly known as the rough persoonia, is a flowering plant native to Australia. It belongs to the family Proteaceae and is characterized by its woody structure and distinctive foliage. The plant produces small, white or yellowish flowers that are typically clustered in inflorescences. Its leaves are usually rough to the touch, giving it its common name. Persoonia scabra is often found in heathlands and woodlands, thriving in well-drained soils.
